profile.component.explanation: Please enter information about you, your lifestyle and your rig to help us match you with other RVers for more relavant information and answers to your questions.
profile.component.personalExplanation: This information will be used to find information that is relavant to the way you RV.  The more complete, the better your results!
profile.component.personalHelp: Click on any help icon for information on how the data point will be used for you.
profile.component.helpName: Used for communication between RVLikeMe.com and you
profile.component.helpDisplayName: Your 'name' as shown to other users.  This could be your real name or a 'handle'.
profile.component.helpEmail: Your user name for signing in and for communications from RVLikeMe.com
profile.component.helpYearOfBirth: Used to enable you to find people near your age group and will not be displayed to other users.
profile.component.helpHomeCountry: Used to find other users that share your country of origin or domicile
profile.component.helpHomeState: Used to find other users that share your state of origin or domicile
